### [Readonly](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00007-easy-readonly/README.md)
[Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-iYXSoNQa-nNTZYBrqsIq7XIMaYDUQYDACAAUTUUzUnK+2B+lUBwNUfR2sqoFxmdEIlLFDUNxtNOGVEA15FtkO9vv9QZDYe+v22khjvWruwIEymydTsTRzUVADU5MgigtVABxUpatjkTkMOh0HwSJF+jGGBgNPQSBpQrLAaBgEDAKygCAAfUPR+PR4gAE1ytC2kyIDqNAeT4-9xBt1YUx8pTLEvhUoqVeSoHjb8IAAbQABXqVQzHwW4UgAXU5FJwLgsABTAPcn0fZYnEqFpUDWHpMJPF8dzkXwoQ2AYwlJQMAEc2FQXADgDWFBmMCA+Qgfgpi8CAAHJuHfZA4AXRj-B5JxgAqBQJD4t8qM+fD5hVECiBYti6CSAN6MYpJP00b9UjFABGNIDi-bQjKwUy0jMsAULAbFcXxQkTNVSlShpDp6SgTNWXZc0uR8z5MERdZXk5chrX8PgiECOhUE5ACoF6ComFDIKeQdNCMKI092FmM5oQAZRxacHzy59X1AIhFWKhhbTCGC2GhCRMFwaT2nHSdp1nYB50XZdVzUddoGAPgJCKPJaogbte1WdrOuFbqpxnOcjUGlc1w3YA2o6gLMQgRUJShMIWgasYghyGcIAnVa+oGpctpGrcdyAA)

`in` が重要

```typescript
type MyReadonly<T> = {
  readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]
}
```

`in keyof` で 反復処理のような動きをする
